title: Aleutian World War II National Historic Area: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia       In Their Words: Stories from the Aleutians Listen to interviews and learn about some of the people whose lives intersected with the Aleutians campaign in World War II.       Photo Galleries  Check out the Aleutian World War II photo galleries. Galleries include: Photos from veterans, Military Forces, and Panoramas.       Videos  War wrought many changes to daily life for those living in the Aleutians. Watch Makushin, a short video that tells a story of forced evacuation and separation from home.
